title: Bring Iron Maiden to Australia Petition
content:
hello everybody, i'm back
anyway the 1st thing i did when i returned was to sign this petition
a friend told me about it is to bring iron maiden to australia
as everybody knows that they haven't preformed live in australia in over 10 years so if u r aussie & like maiden u might want 2 sign it & who knows maby they will return

[url=http://www.petitiononline.com/mod_perl/signed.cgi?imaiden&1]www.petitiononline.com/mod_perl/signed.cgi?imaiden&1[/url]

gotta go will speak 2 u all again soon
rorieRorie

title: Re: Bring Iron Maiden to Australia Petition
content:
On the one hand; I like Iron Maiden

On the other, its to australia, not NZ

I'll sign anyway.A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Bring Iron Maiden to Australia Petition
content:
Well, good luck with the petition, it'll probably need a lot names to get them notice. Why haven't they been in the OZ for so long time?3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Bring Iron Maiden to Australia Petition
content:
Probably because it's to expensive to move the complete stageshow there just to play three shows.
Who can disagree with them?-----------------
